summary: Changes the appearance of J\'zargo from the College of Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
I was disappointed that there was no makeover mod for J\'zargo on the nexus, so I made my own. He is one of the only 2 Khajiit followers in the game, hence the only Khajiit mage follower.

This mod does not only just change his appearance, but also allows you to remove his hood while trading so that you can see his face.

To Install:
Place the .esp and .bsa into your Skyrim\'s data folder. Don\'t forget to check the .esp in the launcher.

Recommended Mods:
Coverkhajiits - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941
High Quality Eyes by Xenius - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498
Smile in HD - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34346

My Other Mods:
Better Ulfric - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27323
Better Ysolda - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21056
Better Vignar - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20799
Better Carlotta - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21057
Better Olfina - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21024
author: Noobpwnerking
